simText.textData:
Welcome. I'm your virtual coach. This exercise is a pre-requisite for attending: Electrical/Electronics, Terminals and Connectors #18043.04H. After completing this simulation you will be able to:

1. Perform voltage measurements using the MIN-MAX feature on
the DMM.
2. Demonstrate understanding of the use of a clamping diode
in a circuit.
It is estimated that it will take 10-15 minutes to complete this session. Please click Continue.

Warning: If you exit this simulation before completion, you MUST restart it when you return. It is strongly suggested that you take this and each simulation in its entirety.
Take a few moments to familiarize yourself with the DMM before you begin this course. Please start by clicking on it.

For this portion of the exercise in this workstation you will:
1.Measure the voltage across the relay coil while operating the circuit, using the MIN-Max feature of the DMM.
2. Observe the minimum and maximum voltages.
3. Determine the effects on a circuit when a relay controls loads.

Please click continue when you are ready to move forward.
